mapper.sql: SELECT notice_id, notice_title, notice_content, writer, write_date, modify_date, view_cnt, upload_file FROM notice
mapper.select: ORDER BY write_date DESC, notice_id DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (notice_title, notice_content, writer, write_date) VALUES (#{notice_title}, #{notice_content}, '장민수', now())
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET notice_title = #{notice_title}, notice_content = #{notice_content}, modify_date = now() WHERE notice_id = #{notice_id}
